title: Brooke Shields and Martha Hunt cuddle up at star-studded Take Home A Nude charity auction in NYC
text:
Brooke Shields and Martha Hunt cuddled up to one another at the New York Academy Of Art Take Home A Nude charity action on Tuesday.

The swank event was hosted by Sotheby's, where Brooke, 54, and Martha, 30, could be glimpsed chatting amiably with one another.

Brooke slipped into an off-the-shoulder black gown that flashed her cleavage and included a gleaming quilted silver patch.

Side by side: Brooke Shields and Martha Hunt cuddled up to one another at the New York Academy Of Art Take Home A Nude charity action on Tuesday

Letting her dark brown hair down, the Suddenly Susan star accentuated her unmistakable features with makeup including nude lipstick.

She added a touch of glitz to her ensemble with a pair of hoop earrings and a stack of bracelets, treating the cameras to an enigmatic smile.

Her New York chic dress was hemmed just above the knee, allowing her to show off her tone legs as she balanced on a pair of black stilettos.

Meanwhile, Martha, a Victoria's Secret Angel, went bra-less under a glinting bright orange dress that faintly resembled a nightie.

The blonde bombshell turned and flashed her megawatt smile over her shoulder, showing the shutterbugs her outfit was backless.

She slid into a pair of black stilettos that featured fishnet straps past the ankle, and as she headed into the event she held a matching clutch.

Brooke and Martha looked delighted with each other's company as they wrapped their arms around each other for the photographers.

The art auction's guest list included star of stage and screen Alan Cumming, who threw up a peace sign whilst modeling a casual monochrome ensemble.
